channel.title: General Christmas Hiromi Travel Japan New Years on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Christmas Hiromi Travel Japan New Years on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Going to Japan.
item.description: So I leave on Sunday to go visit Hiromi in Tokyo. I am excited. It will be my 3rd time visiting her this year and I will be there for 13 days! whooo. I will be spending most of my time in Tokyo (I think), but we will be traveling to Yamanashi to celebrate new years with her family. It will be the first time I will meet most of them. I am excited and a bit nervous.
